headline.main: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal
headline.print_headline: IMF Reaches Deal With Ukraine Paving Way for Next Loan Disbursal

lead_paragraph: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March.
snippet: The International Monetary Fund said on Saturday it had reached an agreement with Ukraine on an updated memorandum under a $17.5 billion program, paving the way for its board to consider the disbursement of the fourth loan tranche later in March....
